An idempotent law for substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-Jul-2019.)

 An idempotent law for substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.) (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 21-Jan-2018.)
statement: sbidm $p |- ( [ y / x ] [ y / x ] ph <-> [ y / x ] ph ) $.
